Don't buy the wrong gear

Educate yourself with our buyers guides.

Just Getting Started?

Want to try spearfishing? Buying a whole set of gear is a daunting task, but when you know what to look for, it can be painless.

Read our beginners guide to spearfishing equipment

When buying a Speargun, always consider:

  • Diving environment
  • Speargun material
  • Band type
Read speargun buyers guide

When buying a Wetsuit, always consider:

  • Water temperature
  • Wetsuit lining
  • Suit color
Read wetsuit buyers guide
